name: 董容辰
objective:
1. Laser cavity modes 
2. Astigmatic mode transformation 
3. Tight-pumping effect
4. Nonlinear optics
schedule:
Introduction (1 week)
Laser modes in spherical resonators (3 weeks)
Theory of astigmatic mode converter (AMC) (1 week)
Propagation evolution of laser modes by an AMC (3 weeks)
Midterm exam
Effect of tight pumping on cavity modes (1 week)
Propagation evolution of tight-pumping modes by an AMC (1 week)
Phase-matching cutting angle (1 week)
Temperature dependence of relative efficiency (1 week)
Wave distribution of second harmonic generation (SHG) (1 week)
Astigmatic mode transformation of SHG waves (1 week)
Final exam
materials:
Lasers, A. E. Siegman
Laser Electronics, Joseph T. Verdeyen
